import React, { Component } from 'react' export class LoginPage extends Component { // Holds all the state variables state = { email: '', password: '' } // Handles Login handleLogin(){ console.log(this.state.email, this.state.password) } onChange = (e) => this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); render() { return(
QuickBooks
Welcome back! Log in to your account.
Not a user? Sign up
); } } export default LoginPage
